known_issues: Carousel currently shows only one image even though multiple images were uploaded; should allow manual navigation through all provided images

existing_features.title: Update Pride Moments content to use the uploaded images in the carousel by replacing the existing Pride Moments event image sources with /assets/im1-3.jpg, /assets/im2-3.jpg, /assets/im1-4.jpg, /assets/im2-4.jpg, and /assets/im1-5.jpg (keeping meaningful English alt text for each image).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update carousel to manually navigate through multiple uploaded images (im1â€“im4/5) instead of showing only one image
Add the 5 user-uploaded images (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) to the frontend static assets so they can be referenced by the Pride Moments carousel.
Ensure the Pride Moments carousel remains fully manual (no auto-advance) and users can navigate through all provided images using previous/next buttons and indicators.
